mapper.select: SELECT r.r_no,s.si_type,s.s_num,r.r_name,r.r_tel,r.r_count,r.r_in,r.r_out,r.r_today,p.p_method,p.p_amount,p.p_check FROM reservation r join site s ON r.s_no=s.s_no join payaccount p ON r.r_no=p.r_no order BY r.r_today LIMIT #{number},15;
SELECT * FROM payaccount order by n_no desc limit #{no},#{board_num};
SELECT count(r.r_no) FROM reservation r join site s ON r.s_no=s.s_no join payaccount p ON r.r_no=p.r_no;
